data.title: 2025 Best Small Colleges in Georgia
data.meta_description: Ranking of the best small colleges in Georgia. Compare the smallest Georgia colleges.
data.text:
Emory University-Oxford College

2 Year ,

OXFORD, GA ,

33 Niche users give it an average review of 3.9 stars.

Featured Review: Sophomore says When applying to colleges my senior year of high school I was very adamant choosing a school with high diversity ratings. Since being at Oxford I am very happy with the diversity in the student body... .

Read 33 reviews.

Overall Niche Grade : A minus ,

Acceptance Rate : 15% ,

Net Price : $32,842 ,

SAT Range : 1430-1540 ,

#1 Best Small Colleges in Georgia .

Spelman College

4 Year ,

ATLANTA, GA ,

1262 Niche users give it an average review of 3.7 stars.

Featured Review: Freshman says Spelman College is a place where I feel truly empowered. The professors are very knowledgeable and genuinely care about our success. I love the focus on academic excellence. The rich cultural history... However, there are a few areas that could improve. I'd like to see more resources for mental health support and wellness. While the campus is beautiful, some facilities could use updates to better... Overall, my experience at Spelman has been excellent. It has helped me grow both academically and personally. I'm honored to be a part of the Spelman sisterhood! .

Read 1262 reviews.

Overall Niche Grade : B+ ,

Acceptance Rate : 28% ,

Net Price : $37,085 ,

SAT Range : 1050-1200 ,
